text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ――Ah, crap! I might have lost my ear cover!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? Don't tell me it's from the costume!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, that can't be…… When I took it off 
yesterday, I threw it on the bed……what happened!?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you're so rude! I told you to put it away! 
It's important!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Man, you said it… Ahaha… Scarlet, 
please! Help me find it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …What's so cool about this? It's so lame.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey! What did you just say?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…I said I'd help you find it. And while 
I'm at it, should I put a bell on you 
so you don't lose it again?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…! Fine, I won't ask for your help after all! 
Geez, let's show the others what you're made of!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What's that supposed to mean?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
In the end, you're just an outsider! 
Even if you're an honors student, 
you're just really annoying!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …! That's terrible! I can't believe it!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Why aren't you being so tactless?! Aaah, I don't 
want to be called 'one and only'!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …! I'll say exactly what you said!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Whenever something happens, we're always treated 
like a team! I've never thought of you as 
anything special!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: (…What? What?! What's your one and only…)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Your one and only…!)

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: (It's not me…?) (It's not me?)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ――So, did something happen between you two?

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: …Not really. …No.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …No, I won't say anything. It's almost Christmas…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
They're the same as always, aren't they? In that 
case, just leave them be.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… But somehow, it feels gloomy. Maybe we need 
a break. In that case…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hey! Why don't we all go to Hallon Tower?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
――In that case, Brian and I will go greet them. 
Laurel, I'll leave it to you. ……okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yeah, have a good day! …Alright.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
It's so lively. I bet more people will come to 
see the lights!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yes, you're right. I can't let you see me fail…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, are you worried? Don't worry, we're 
invincible together! We're in perfect sync.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We're not in sync. We're the exact opposite…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Isn't that exactly why it fits?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
You know, when you combine the characters 
together, they really fit together perfectly. 
Just like that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
For example, during the music performance! They're both so 
enthusiastic about it that they're all like, ”I'm the one who's 
doing it!” At first glance, they're supposed to be munching 
away…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I know they're coming out here, so don't bump 
into them. We've decided to compete side by side.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
We're both watching each other closely, and we 
understand each other without saying anything. 
That's because we're bumping into each other…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
――It's a unique combination, so it's something 
you can do, right?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
――Well then, if you'll excuse me. Now then…… 
Laurel should be doing well.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
By the way, what's wrong? It's not like you to 
come with me to a meeting.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …You're too excited.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Hey, there's a limit to what you can say. 
What do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You were determined to make it a 
success. Is that… for Rudolph? Do 
you want to be praised by her?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…Hah. I was wondering what you were going to 
say, but… You wanted to be praised? I had to 
hold my breath.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember the first Christmas event that 
the Student Council took shape?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The event was a success thanks to the chairman's 
meticulous plan. On the way home…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The chairman looks up at Haron Tower and says, 
『We will create a symbol like that tower that 
everyone must strive for.』

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
To create a world where everyone can live 
happily… Pres's vision is high. I empathize with 
her desire and say, 'What a beautiful light.'

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: And Pres…
